delete-node: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
descriptor-tip: Add a README.txt or README.md file to the directory to display its description here.
directory-unloaded: expand this directory in the outline or click on the open button in the toolbar to open its content
empty: When you select an node on the outline, its details will show here.

errors.UNABLE_FETCH_CONTENT: Unable to fetch content from file
errors.UNABLE_POST_CONTENT: Unable to save content to file

load-nodes.idle: click to enable the background loading
load-nodes.loading: click to disable the background loading

name: name
not-loaded: Please wait a moment while this node is loaded.

actions.title: Access your files using one of the methods below

privacy.text: The project has a strong focus on privacy and does not track or store data about you or your files. Even so, be aware of the policies for any service you choose. Read more in the {0} and the {1}.

overview.text: Calystone is an app that helps you organize your life through your file system, with features like note taking and task management. Learn more about its capabilities and motivation in this {0}.

open-source.text: Calystone is open-source. Explore the project at {0}.
